body.title: Page view
body.elms:
```js
ga('create', 'UA-XXXX-Y', 'auto')
ga('create', 'UA-XXXX-Y', { userId: 'USER_ID' })
```

```js
ga('send', 'pageview')
ga('send', 'pageview', { 'dimension15': 'My custom dimension' })
```

body.title: Exceptions
body.elms:
```js
ga('send', 'exception', {
  exDescription: 'DatabaseError',
  exFatal: false,
  appName: 'myapp',
  appVersion: '0.1.2'
})
```
